name: Run for The Medal
description:
How to Play:

 

  Playing this game is very simple Players needs to collect energies as quickly as possible before the remaining time end and they need complete the parkour by using Space Key in order to jump between platforms to platforms. The game is 3 levels.

 

Story:

Our main character wants to be an Olympic champion but first he needs to be fit for the championship, so he needs to be run every day. He wakes up every morning at 7am and go to the run. Every day he runs and runs eventually he becomes fit and wants to become Olympic runner. He runs different parkours every day.
